name: Camelot Creamery
description: Camelot Creamery, a timber-framed building nestled among other artisanal establishments, is known for its variety of cheeses and other dairy products. The owner, <u>Cedric Lorraine</u>, is an elderly man with a passion for cheese-making, often sharing his knowledge and the shopâ€™s history with customers. Despite his aging brain, he still handles many critical tasks in the cheese-making process. Apprentice <u>Matilda Warenne</u>, a young woman with a sense of wonder for the transformation from milk to cheese, is learning about all the cheeses and enjoys sharing her knowledge with customers. She is responsible for adding the correct measures of various types of milk to the vats, cutting and scooping out the curds, pressing the curds into molds, and coating the wheels in colored wax.

quest.name: The Lost Recipe of the Moonlit Brie
quest.description: While perusing an old book an apprentice gifted him, Cedric discovered a clue to the famous, long-lost recipe for Moonlit Brie, supposedly the finest brie cheese that has ever been made. Combined with other clues collected over the decades, he believes he finally knows enough to discover the location of the recipe. He now seeks a crew of seasoned travelers to accompany him on this journey and keep him safe as he follows the trail to hopefully recover the recipe and make this fabled cheese once before he dies.
